title: The Way of the Gun
creator_credit: Christopher McQuarrie, Maia Javan and Kenneth Kokin
brief_description: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.

constellations_other.name: Kylie to Lucy
constellations_other.description: 'Did It Again' started the conversation about Kylie Minogue being more than just a pop star, it started to cement her status as one of the most important audio and visual artists of her time, but the video had an unlikely inspiration.

creator_credit_for_label: Christopher McQuarrie, Maia Javan and Kenneth Kokin
description: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.
